title: Untitled, illustration to Wilhelm Hauff's poem "Dawn's Light" (Morgenrot, Morgenrot) (border, 6th song, folio 44) from the periodical Der Bildermann, supplement to vol. 1, no. 11 (Sep 1916)
dimensions: Composition (irreg.): 11 x 8 5/16" (28 x 21.1 cm); page: 14 x 11" (35.6 x 27.9 cm)
credits: Gift of Mrs. Bertha M. Slattery
